Content.Text:
He's coming to see us today, so please
don't say anything while he's here.

Grandson or no, he's a bad'un, that one!
<PAGE>
A single letter in who knows how long,
saying his friend is in the hospital and
he needs cash? You're kidding!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If he needs money then that's all we
need to know.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
This sick friend routine is a hoax, of
course! He's taking advantage of your
kindness to swindle more cash from you!
<PAGE>
You can't let yourself get fooled again.
I'm going to tell him, you'll see.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
He's our grandson, so what's the
problem? Just let me do as I please.
Hey, grandma?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so nice to see you. We've been
waiting for you.
Grandma, have you got the cash ready?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How is your friend?

Not very good. He needs surgery quickly,
but he just doesn't have the cash.
<PAGE>
So I need to do something...

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
A sick friend? Really?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's okay. He needs our help.

T-That's right. I really need some help
here. Please...

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need to say anything else. You're a
kind kid who always puts his friends
first.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you go. I've got it all ready for
you.

Grandma, thanks so much. This'll really
make a difference.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do you know what that money is for?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please, don't say anything else. Go and
save your friend.
See you, Grandma. Take care of yourself.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You too. If you need anything then just
come and see us again.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, Hana! That's the money you saved up
from the sales in the store!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's right. I saved it up to use it
for something fun in the future.
<PAGE>
And that's exactly what I used it for,
isn't it?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We don't need much money at our age, do
we?
<PAGE>
I'm happy so long as he is happy.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
But he's lying to us!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
He isn't.
<PAGE>
Well, even if he is, what of it? Did you
see how happy he was?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hana, you're just enabling him!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Whatever is the matter?
Grandma. About this money...

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've given it to you. Go on, take it.

I... I was lying! I'm sorry. Please
forgive me. I want you to take the money
back.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's okay. Your apology is enough.
<PAGE>
That money is just a thank you for
coming and showing us your face.
Take it, please.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
She's right, son. Use that money however
you like.
G-Grandpa!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't make that face! You're a man,
aren't you? So act like one!
Grandpa... Grandma... thank you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing interesting around
here, anyway. I'll see you off.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hana's such a good woman. It's hard not
to follow her example!
